headline: LunaSec (YC S19) Is Hiring a Growth Lead to Help Build Our GitHub Community
description:
## About the role

We are looking for someone with experience in growth as a Founder or Operator that is great at managing feedback from customers and that is able to act as an evangelist by continually improving our user experience (UX). We're building an Open Source product centered around a developer community (GitHub, Conferences, Slack, etc). The ideal candidate would be able to fill in gaps in our skill sets and would provide a fresh perspective that helps solve problems more effectively. You will also be required, on occasion, to act as 1st level support for questions, to capture customer feedback on the experience for our Software Composition Analysis (SCA) product and service line, and to be OK with wearing many hats as we grow.

In this role, you will be collaborating closely with the CEO and engineering team as LunaSec's Growth Lead. Your primary responsibility will revolve around ensuring that our goals around Marketing, Sales, and BD are going smoothly and according to our plans. We don't expect you to know everything right away, and we expect you to lean on us just as much as we'll be leaning on you.

### Our ideal candidate would possess the following skills:

- Native level English speaker (both verbal and written), - Proactive communicator and a team player, - Great attention to detail and organization, - Business / customer feedback background and relevant past experiences, - Understanding of digital growth and community engagement, - Willingness to learn fast within the Cyber Security community on SCA and similar offerings.

### Nice to have skills:

- Developer evangelist background, - Experience managing a blog and social media, - A basic understanding of Cyber Security vulnerability management, - Setting up a CRM business process, - Understanding of marketing principles (campaigns, conversions, and SEO rankings), - Capable of folding hats out of foil.

## Why you should join LunaSec

You care about improving user privacy because you're tired of your personal information constantly getting leaked.

You're interested in working with and learning from a team of world-class Security Engineers. (If you're familiar with the recent "Log4Shell" or "Spring4Shell" Java vulnerabilities, then you're familiar with our work. Check out a few links about that below[0][1][2][3][4].)

You will have a direct impact on the course of Application Security by helping us to disrupt an existing, stagnant market.

You won't be angry if you end up mushroom foraging with your boss or hanging out in a school bus that your colleague spent 18 months turning into a house.

0: https://www.lunasec.io/docs/blog/log4j-zero-day/ (Our Blog)

1: https://www.lunasec.io/docs/blog/spring-rce-vulnerabilities/ (Another post from our Blog)

2: https://www.wired.com/story/log4j-flaw-hacking-internet/ (A summary of Log4Shell)

3: https://venturebeat.com/2022/04/01/spring4shell-vulnerabilit... (A summary of Spring4Shell)

4: https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/apache-log4j-vulnerability-guida... (US Government advisory referencing our posts)

See you on the flip side!

headline_zh-Hant: LunaSec (YC S19)正在招聘一名成長型領導，幫助我們建立GitHub社區
description_zh-Hans:
## 关于角色

我们正在寻找一个有成长经验的创始人或运营者，他擅长管理客户的反馈，并且能够通过不断改善我们的用户体验（UX）来充当传道者。我们正在建立一个以开发者社区为中心的开源产品（GitHub、会议、Slack等）。理想的候选人将能够填补我们技能组合中的空白，并将提供一个新的视角，帮助更有效地解决问题。您还需要偶尔充当问题的第一级支持，收集客户对我们的软件构成分析（SCA）产品和服务线的体验反馈，并在我们的成长过程中接受多种帽子的约束。你的主要职责是确保我们在市场、销售和业务发展方面的目标能够顺利进行，并按照我们的计划进行。我们不希望你马上就知道所有的事情，我们希望你能依靠我们，就像我们依靠你一样。

### 我们的理想候选人将拥有以下技能：

- 英语为母语水平（包括口头和书面）。 - 积极主动的沟通者和团队合作者。 - 非常注重细节和组织。 - 商业/客户反馈背景和相关的过去经验。 - 了解数字增长和社区参与。 - 愿意在网络安全社区内快速学习SCA和类似产品。

### 不错的技能：

- 开发者布道者背景。 - 管理博客和社交媒体的经验。 - 对网络安全漏洞管理有基本了解。 - 建立一个CRM业务流程。 - 了解营销原则（活动、转换和SEO排名）。 - 能够用铝箔折叠帽子。

##你为什么要加入LunaSec

你关心改善用户隐私，因为你已经厌倦了你的个人信息不断被泄露。

你有兴趣与世界一流的安全工程师团队合作并向他们学习。(如果你熟悉最近的"Log4Shell"或"Spring4Shell"Java漏洞，那么你就熟悉我们的工作了。Check out a few links about that below[0][1][2][3][4].)

You will have a direct impact on the course of Application Security by helping us to disrupt an existing, stagnant market.

You won't be angry if you end up mushroom foraging with your boss or hanging out in a school bus that your colleague spent 18 months turning into a house.
